body:
Hey guys, I know this isn't avicus and or minecraft related but I thought both of our skiing videos (both different times of recordings) were pretty funny, I'm hoping it will cheer up a few people :) Enjoy!

vladthegreat100's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wut6hxZ1wIc&feature=youtu.be
MLGPorky's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UFY4jEv-UUk
 
Have a great day!

title: Skiing w/ MLGPorky [Videos]

replies.body: Nice Vids! I enjoy skiing, it's pretty fun, especially when it's with friends xP

replies.body:
Thanks for the feedback guys!
We don't really know if people enjoy watching these little skiing videos, but we can certainly make more if they're entertaining! :)
